resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105366</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105366</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1879158235</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hands on Learning, Demonstrations on Video</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hände auf dem Lernen, Demonstrationen auf 
Bildschirm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mains sur apprendre, démonstrations sur le vidéo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mãos na aprendizagem, demonstrações no vídeo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mani sull'imparare, dimostrazioni sul video</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χέρια στην εκμάθηση, επιδείξεις στο βίντεο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manos en aprender, demostraciones en el vídeo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Watch science come alive in demonstrations of magnetic levitation techniques, ways to rig a sailboat, and much more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Uhrwissenschaft kommen lebendig in den 
Demonstrationen der magnetischen Schwebentechniken, in den Methoden, 
ein Segelboot in Ordnung zu bringen und viel in mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La science de montre viennent vivant dans les 
démonstrations des techniques magnétiques de lévitation, les voies 
de caler un bateau à voiles, et beaucoup plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ciência do relógio vem vivo nas demonstrações
de técnicas magnéticas do levitation, nas maneiras equipar um 
sailboat, e em muito mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scienza della vigilanza viene vivo nelle 
dimostrazioni delle tecniche magnetiche di levitazione, nei modi 
attrezzare una barca a vela ed in molto più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιστήμη ρολογιών έρχεται ζωντανός στις επιδείξεις 
των τεχνικών μαγνητικού μετεωρισμού, τρόποι να εξοπλιστεί 
sailboat, και πολύ περισσότερο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ciencia del reloj viene vivo en demostraciones 
de las técnicas magnéticas de la levitación, maneras de aparejar un
barco de vela, y mucho más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LEWIN, WALTER
FN:LEWIN, WALTER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1879158235</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105366</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/hands-on-learning-demonstrations-on-video</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
